name: ranger-sor-sdk
description: TypeScript SDK for the Ranger Smart Order Router (SOR) API

scripts.test:sdk: ts-node test/sdk-test.ts # Tests SDK structure and type safety
scripts.test:mock: ts-node test/mock-api-test.ts # Tests SDK with mocked API responses
scripts.test:real: ts-node test/real-api-test.ts # Tests SDK with real API endpoints (requires API key)
scripts.test:jest: jest test/jest-api-test.ts # Run Jest-based tests with real API endpoints

author: Yong Kang <chiayongkang@hotmail.com>
